name: Emmanuel Karanja
title: Designer & Full-stack web developer
bio: Agile, versatile and enthusiastic programmer and entrepreneur.
description:
Experienced agile developer and UI/UX designer familiar with DevOps practices, working in a Linux based environment with technologies such as JavaScript, Typescript, PHP and more. 
 Comfortable with tools such as Figma, Adobe XD and Adobe Illustrator. 
 I strive to create great applications that address users’ needs while maintaining code readability and reusability by following best design practices and laid out rules. 
 Passionate about open source, I like contributing to awesome open source projects. Taking part in challenges and hackathons is a hobby I enjoy, as well as art🎨 and sports🏀
